parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: TransferType
parameters.description:
The transfer type. Valid values:

*   IN: transferred to this account.
*   OUT: transferred from this account.
